Detailed Description

Exposes methods for retrieving, analyzing and traversing stack traces.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktStackTrace::Address ( [in] LONG  depth,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal 
)

Get the address of a call.

Parameters
depthThe depth in the stack trace.
[in,out]pValA pointer to a pointer-sized value to store address.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer parameter is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if the specified call depth is invalid.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if requested information could not be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
Remarks
Maximum stack searching depth is 50, as determined by the internal NKT_DV_TMSG_ONHOOKCALLED_StackTraceDepth constant.
HRESULT INktStackTrace::Module ( [in] LONG  depth,
[out, retval] INktModule **  ppMod 
)

Find the module associated with a call.

Parameters
depthThe depth in the stack trace.
[in,out]ppModA pointer to receive the exported function interface.
Remarks
Interface should be released in the OnFunctionCalled context. In .NET you should use Marshal.ReleaseComObject after using it.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer parameter is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if the specified call depth is invalid.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if requested information could not be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
Remarks
Maximum stack searching depth is 50, as determined by the internal NKT_DV_TMSG_ONHOOKCALLED_StackTraceDepth constant.
HRESULT INktStackTrace::NearestFunction ( [in] LONG  depth,
[out, retval] INktExportedFunction **  ppExpFunc 
)

Find the exported function associated with a call.

Parameters
depthThe depth in the stack trace.
[in,out]ppExpFuncA pointer to receive the exported function interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer parameter is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if the specified call depth is invalid.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if requested information could not be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
Remarks
Maximum stack searching depth is 50, as determined by the internal NKT_DV_TMSG_ONHOOKCALLED_StackTraceDepth constant.
HRESULT INktStackTrace::NearestSymbol ( [in] LONG  depth,
[out, retval] BSTR *  pVal 
)

Find the nearest symbol associated with a call.

Parameters
depthThe depth in the stack trace.
[in,out]pValA string pointer to receive the symbol name, if any.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer parameter is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if the specified call depth is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if requested information could not be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
Remarks
Maximum stack searching depth is 50, as determined by the internal NKT_DV_TMSG_ONHOOKCALLED_StackTraceDepth constant.
HRESULT INktStackTrace::Offset ( [in] LONG  depth,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal 
)

Get the call offset relative to the module base address.

Parameters
depthThe depth in the stack trace.
[in,out]pValA pointer to a pointer-sized value to store address.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer parameter is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if the specified call depth is invalid.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if requested information could not be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
Remarks
Maximum stack searching depth is 50, as determined by the internal NKT_DV_TMSG_ONHOOKCALLED_StackTraceDepth constant.
HRESULT INktStackTrace::Params ( [in] LONG  depth,
[out, retval] INktParamsEnum **  ppParamsEnum 
)

Get the parameters associated with a call.

Parameters
depthThe depth in the stack trace.
[in,out]ppParamsEnumA pointer to receive the parameter enumeration interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer parameter is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if the specified call depth is invalid.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if requested information could not be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
Remarks
Maximum stack searching depth is 50, as determined by the internal NKT_DV_TMSG_ONHOOKCALLED_StackTraceDepth constant.
HRESULT INktStackTrace::Result ( [in] LONG  depth,
[out, retval] INktParam **  ppParam 
)

Get the result associated with a call.

Parameters
depthThe depth in the stack trace.
[in,out]ppParamA pointer to receive the parameter interface representing the function call result.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer parameter is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if the specified call depth is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if requested information could not be found.
E_FAIL on general error.
Remarks
Maximum stack searching depth is 50, as determined by the internal NKT_DV_TMSG_ONHOOKCALLED_StackTraceDepth constant.
